nodes.text: The Force Awakens: Finn's Story is a young-readers chapter book that retells the events of Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens from the perspective of the character Finn. Written by Jesse J. Holland, with art by Brian Rood, it was published on September 13, 2016. It was collected in a German compilation by Panini on October 16, 2017.

Experience Star Wars: The Force Awakens from the point of view of one of the film's biggest breakout characters! Finn is a former First Order stormtrooper with a unique story. Follow along as he gets swept up into an adventure he never thought possible!
